sources.title: Dreaming Lips
sources.description: Title: Dreaming Lips Summary: Directed by: Paul Czinner Actors: Elisabeth Bergner, Raymond Massey, Romney Brent Production Company: Trafalgar Film Productions Ltd. Release Date: 19 May 1937 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: Tragic story of the wife of a violin player in a famous orchestra, who falls in love with her husband's friend, and finally drowns herself.
metadata.Writer: Carl Mayer, Henri Bernstein, Robert Cullen
metadata.Actors: Elisabeth Bergner, Raymond Massey, Romney Brent
